meanings.definition: A person skilled in a particular craft or activity.
meanings.sent1: The artis carefully carved a wooden figurine.
meanings.sent2: The artis showed great talent in painting portraits.
meanings.sent3: The artis decided to try sculpting with mashed potatoes for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved with the precision of an artis crafting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The young artis learned to sew intricate patterns with ease.

meanings.definition: The products of human creativity; works of art collectively.
meanings.sent1: The gallery displayed various artis from local artists.
meanings.sent2: She admired the artis hanging on the museum walls.
meanings.sent3: The artis in the exhibition seemed to dance in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the vibrant colors of the artis.
meanings.sent5: The artis in the collection told stories of the past.

meanings.definition: The expression or application of human creative skill and imagination.
meanings.sent1: Her dance was an artis of emotion and grace.
meanings.sent2: The film captured the essence of cinematic artis.
meanings.sent3: The artis of baking a cake became a hilarious disaster.
meanings.sent4: His words painted a picture with the artis of a poet.
meanings.sent5: The artis of storytelling enchanted the audience.
